sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>Beaker</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result>VERIFY: Block labels print or cassettes are etched. In case inquiry, validate against print activity</expected_result> <number>TS0001981</number> <order>116</order> <prep_step>false</prep_step> <state>draft</state> <sys_created_by>RBUSCH</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-19 20:52:47</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1e5c9d5fdb9f5b0040f8fcfa0c96196c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>RBUSCH</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-19 20:52:47</sys_updated_on> <test>Click the Grossing button in the activity menu bar, then scan specimen A - this will autopopulate the gross description. F2 will fill in astriks. Print block. Select "Gross Done" button - this advances the case status. If a label or scanner is not available, type "A" and then into the box in the upper-right corner of the Grossing window, followed by Enter or Tab.</test> <test_script display_value="TES0001004">1ebb155fdb9f5b0040f8fcfa0c9619bf</test_script> <testing_user>BKRPATHA</testing_user> </x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step> </record_update>
